Package org.apache.avalon.phoenix.components.manager

System management services.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AbstractJMXManager An abstract class via which JMX Managers can extend.
AbstractSystemManager This is abstract implementation of SystemManager.
MBeanInfoBuilder An MBeanInfoBuilder is responsible for building Management Topic objects from Configuration objects.
MX4JLoggerAdapter A class to pipe MX4J's own logger to the one Phoenix wants to use.
MX4JSystemManager This component is responsible for managing phoenix instance.
NoopSystemManager Null SystemManager.
Target It reprensents a managed object in the managegement space.
 

Package org.apache.avalon.phoenix.components.manager Description

System management services.
